podcasts.title: The Joe Rogan Experience
podcasts.description: The Joe Rogan Experience is a long-form podcast where Joe Rogan has conversations with guests about various topics.
podcasts.author: Joe Rogan

podcasts.title: Serial
podcasts.description: Serial is a podcast that tells one true story over the course of a season.
podcasts.author: Sarah Koenig

podcasts.title: Science Vs
podcasts.description: Science Vs is the show that pits facts against popular myths and misconceptions.
podcasts.author: Wendy Zukerman

podcasts.title: The Daily
podcasts.description: This is how the news should sound. Twenty minutes a day, five days a week.
podcasts.author: The New York Times

podcasts.title: Freakonomics Radio
podcasts.description: Discover the hidden side of everything with Stephen J. Dubner, co-author of the Freakonomics books.
podcasts.author: Stephen J. Dubner

podcasts.title: Radiolab
podcasts.description: Radiolab is a show about curiosity. Where sound illuminates ideas, and the boundaries blur between science, philosophy, and human experience.
podcasts.author: Jad Abumrad and Robert Krulwich

podcasts.title: How I Built This
podcasts.description: Guy Raz dives into the stories behind some of the world's best-known companies.
podcasts.author: Guy Raz

podcasts.title: The Tim Ferriss Show
podcasts.description: Tim Ferriss deconstructs world-class performers from eclectic areas (investing, sports, business, art, etc.) to extract the tactics, tools, and routines you can use.
podcasts.author: Tim Ferriss

podcasts.title: Song Exploder
podcasts.description: Song Exploder is a podcast where musicians take apart their songs and piece by piece, tell the story of how they were made.
podcasts.author: Hrishikesh Hirway

podcasts.title: Stuff You Should Know
podcasts.description: If you've ever wanted to know about champagne, satanism, the Stonewall Uprising, chaos theory, LSD, El Nino, true crime, and Rosa Parks, then Josh and Chuck have you covered.
podcasts.author: Josh Clark and Chuck Bryant
